website_summaries.verdict: This is an engaging toy for kids who love The Little Mermaid, designed for little ones aged 4 years old and up.
pros: Well made set with fun components that kids enjoy
Snap in pieces are easy to put together
Doll is entertaining as she can swing, slide, and strap into harness
Includes both an Ariel doll as well as Sebastian character
cons: Packaging is hard to get toys out of

customer_reviews.title: Ugh, the packaging for most of the dolls in ...
customer_reviews.text: Ugh, the packaging for most of the dolls in this collection is frustrating, but this one takes the cake. I had to cut Sebastian out of the plastic he was in because he was in there so tight, it was impossible to pop him out. My daughter loves all the sets and dolls, she picked this out herself using her birthday money. She's thrilled, the set is really cute. There's a slide and a swing, and a shell shaped tub for Sebastian. The slide is a little flimsy and the two pieces that make the slide are not staying together well.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great imaginations to be born
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand daughter for her birthday, as several of the other Little Kingdom villages. It was on her list. She has a wonderful imagination and with these sets, and all the small parts that come with them, I am sure she will have loads of fun to last the afternoon away. They seem to be well made through the packaging, will update if that is not so when she opens them on her birthday. My only wish is that Disney would make a larger carrier for all these little villages and their pieces to keep them altogether. Bright colors help keep the imaginations going.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This would be a fun little play castle if the pieces stayed together
customer_reviews.text: This would be a fun little play castle if the pieces stayed together, the one piece she flips on comes off as soon as you touch it, so does the swing, the slide stays on for the most part, I feel like a toy made for little girls shouldn't frustrate them the way this does and the pieces once on should stay on, very dissapointed with this purchase but hey if you like to contantly put it back k together just to have it fall off again then this is for you
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fun set
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute and fun Ariel play set. My five year old got this for her birthday. She plays with this almost every day. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: AndreaRT

customer_reviews.title: It's fun enough
customer_reviews.text: I was about to give it 3 stars because the pieces don't stay together. The slide is always slipping apart and the swing comes off when the characters swings. The only reason it got 4 stars is because my daughter finds it hilarious when the swing falls off or when the slide comes apart.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Tran

customer_reviews.title: Playset Cool but Doll Is Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: This set was okay but the doll is just horrible to try and dress. All the tiny pieces are always popping off and frustrating my kids. Ariel's bra/boobs never seem to stay on and are always getting lost. Unfortunately, this is going to be one of those toys that gets donated too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Girl

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these characters
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these characters!!! My daughter added this princess to her collection. Definitely would not recommend for kids under 3.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter really likes the sounds and she plays with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: not bad but my daughter lost interest
customer_reviews.text: my daughter played for a little bit and lost interest. It pretty but not too much for the kids to do with it
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Cute set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little set! My 2 year old, Ariel obsessed daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: KG621

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and cool concept. However it is not sturdy whatsoever. It is easy to assemble, everything clicks in place but it comes apart very easily. The slide falls off and so does the roof. Sadly, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrzej Krupa

customer_reviews.title: My three year old loves this. As a FYI ...
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves this. As a FYI, for kids that put things in their mouths, there are some really small pieces to this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like how difficult it was to put this thing together ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like how difficult it was to put this thing together there was really no instructions I had to look at the box and figure it out with it being plastic I'm surprised I didn't break it
customer_reviews.author: jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 3-5 year olds +
customer_reviews.text: very cute gift for a little girl, bought this for a 4 year old's birthday party and it was a home run
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a cake topper on the doublesheet cake I made for my niece's Ariel birthday. She LOVED it. !!
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays with this almost every day. Also I was able to use the mermaid figurine as a cake topper. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carla J

customer_reviews.title: Great for amusing my 3yr old
customer_reviews.text: Great for amusing my 3yr old. The liittle accesory pieces are hard for her little fingers but the rest is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste you money.
customer_reviews.text: There is not enough to make it interesting. It doesn't stay together. The doll is hard to put on the swings. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Kids love the concept, but multiple pieces have broken off or do not stay attached. Ariel's tail broke off within two days.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: My girls love it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's love this toy. They always play with this at bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Hallo

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 loves her toy, but it falls apart on her a lot, which makes her disappointed. It's very cheap quality, but she enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Ariel Fan Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This was a favorite!! It's perfect for your little Ariel fan!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Sayers

customer_reviews.title: but whole castle actually comes apart and it's tedious to keep putting back together over and over
customer_reviews.text: The slide is in two pieces, but they do not fit together and keep falling apart. Also I don't mind all the extra pieces that come off, but whole castle actually comes apart and it's tedious to keep putting back together over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute item with intestine little additions like flower swing slide falls apart easily daughter very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Nick Miller

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: This toy seemed very cute from pictures online however it does not stay together and our Ariel snapped in half. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Licameli

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Ariel doll broken when packaged opened. Was a Christmas gift so was past return deadline so I lose out
customer_reviews.author: Kim Mandato

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some of the little add one don't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked it as I thought it was a cute item for a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY L SPRATT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter, she loves Ariel and this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Waldron

customer_reviews.title: She loved
customer_reviews.text: This was a Birthday present for my granddaughter. She loved it

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived promptly and was exactly as advertised. My niece loved it!
customer_reviews.author: PQ

customer_reviews.title: The turrets on the castle don't stay on. Lots ...
customer_reviews.text: The turrets on the castle don't stay on. Lots of little peices to get lost, but my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: S-barrett

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: There are a few very small parts but over all a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect gift for our special niece on her 4th birthday
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for our special niece on her 4th birthday. She was so happy to play with it and has continued to do so since her birthday. I LOVE when we pick the perfect gift. It seemed to be well made and appears that it will be around for a lot of use
customer_reviews.author: Nicholette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a birthday present for my daughter, she loves it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this toy.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy. She got it for christmas and we discovered in the bubbles there are little pieces for Ariel
customer_reviews.author: susan christie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Love it! Most of all, my granddaughters cake was beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Eva Rios

customer_reviews.title: Has enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of tiny pieces but my 3 year old loves little mermaid. Has enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: J K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My niece was super excited to start playing with this!
customer_reviews.author: ChristineRmrzDme

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen such tiny little pieces in my life; this toy seems like its part of the Lego collection. It is also very flimsy, I've had to pop Ariel's head back on a few times now. Also, there are some pieces that are removable that do not need to be such as flowers and a necklace. Unless you enjoy constantly searching for microscopic pieces and assembling them once found, do not purchase this toy.
customer_reviews.author: NYer523

customer_reviews.title: The Little Kingdom figures were so cute, so I ...
customer_reviews.text: The Little Kingdom figures were so cute, so I was looking forward to playing with them with my 4 year old daughter. But their small feet and top heavy dresses make them fall a lot. Ariel's Sea Castle slide is narrow, so some characters won't fit. The bathtub also falls over sometimes. My daughter has played with her Little Kingdom characters and the sea castle very little. She is more interested in her Squinkies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to compliment my daughter's birthday cake. This year her birthday theme is Ariel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Disney Princess Little Kingdom Ariel’s Sea Castle
product_meta.description: Join Ariel and Sebastian on exciting adventures in this palace playground! Ariel's Sea Castle comes with a slide, swing, and vanity. Place Ariel in the seaweed harness, and make her do flips in and out of the water. She can splash, swing, and spin in her castle! Keep the fun going with a back scrubber, a bathtub, and Sebastian. Your little dreamer can keep the fun going by creating Ariel's outfit and accessorizing her with the included Snap-ins. Girls can mix and match Snap-ins across the line to build their own Little Kingdom! Copyright Disney Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA and Imported
Doll is 3 inches tall and can sit or stand
Doll can slide, swing, and strap into the seaweed harness
Doll comes with 5 Snap-ins to mix and match and customize unique looks
Includes doll, bodice, peplum, skirt, playset (unassembled), 3 accessories, 5 Snap-ins, and instructions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars126 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
